full_summary:
Tender Announcement: Starter Generator for Dash 8 Aircraft
=====================================

**Procurement Reference Information:**

*    **Reference Number:** WS4420209276-Doc4422800913
*    **Amendment Number:** 0
*    **Solicitation Number:** WS4420209276

**Tender Details:**

*    **Publication Date:** January 31, 2024
*    **Tender Closing Date:** February 29, 2024, at 14:00:00 hours
*    **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 4, 2024
*    **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Procurement Information:**

*    **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
*    **Procurement Method:** Competitive — Traditional
*    **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*    **Trade Restrictions:** None
*    **Restricted Tenders:** Yes (Supply Arrangement Holders only)

**Tender Description:**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Transport (TC) to procure a Starter Generator for the Dash 8 aircraft.

**Scope of Work:**

*    The successful vendor will be required to provide the specified Starter Generator parts for the Dash 8 aircraft.
*    The starter generator is for the model T8493-140035 series.

**Eligible Bidders:**

Only qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for the T8493-140035 series will be eligible to submit a proposal. The names of these invited bidders are provided in the tender document.

**Contact Information:**

*    Edmond Egikian
*    Contracting Authority
*    Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*    Phone: x
*    Email: edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Documents:**

A copy of the tender document can be obtained from the contacting authority or downloaded from the PSPC website [www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Please Direct All Enquiries to the Contact**
===========================================

Edmond Egikian, Contracting Authority, can be contacted at edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or (phone). Please address all other inquiries to the
